short_description: Dairyland milk has remained a delicious, nutritious part of your day since you can remember. From skim to 3.25%, the Dairyland products Canadians have enjoyed for over 100 years are still as fresh as ever. Proud to be recognized as the Most Trusted Brand* in Canada delivering the best quality milk and cultured products for more than 100 years. We are committed to caring for our communities and providing consumers with delicious dairy made with 100% Canadian milk. *Voted most trusted brand in the Milk category, based on the 2024 BrandSpark Canadian Shopper Study

product_name: Milk2Go 1% Vanilla Partly Skimmed Milk, 310 mL
short_description: Vanilla is not a flavour. Vanilla is the flavour. If you have any doubts, one sip of this tasty vanilla-flavoured milk will make you a believer. Milk2Go is the right balance of fun and convenience. This playful brand offers a variety of flavours of bottled fresh milk to take on the go. We are committed to providing nutritious, delicious, Canadian-produced milk with no preservatives. No refrigeration needed! The ultra-high temperature pasteurization and innovative bottle design allow our milk to stay fresh longer than regular pasteurized milk. Now that’s a twist! Applicable on the 310 mL format only. Milk2Go, the perfect on the go snack for everyone.

product_name: Neilson Crispy Crunch Chocolate Milkshake, 310 mL
short_description: A handful of “indulgence on the go” to satisfy your sweet craving. At Neilson, we've been providing 'always fresh and local' Canadian dairy to families for more than 100 years. We’re proud to be recognized as a Most Trusted Brand* and to be the #1 dairy Masterbrand in Ontario. We continue to offer nutritious dairy products for growing families across the country. *Voted most trusted brand in Ontario in the Milk category, based on the 2024 BrandSpark Canadian Shopper Study. www.BrandSparkMostTrusted.com Neilson’s milkshakes are made with fresh 2% milk and come in five awesome flavours – original Neilson French Vanilla and Strawberry, plus Cadbury Caramilk, Mr. Big and Crispy Crunch.*

product_name: Dairyland 3.25% Old Fashioned Chocolate Milk, 946 mL
short_description: There are few things as satisfying as a fresh glass of our flavoured milk. Dairyland chocolate milk is an excellent source of calcium which aids in the formation and maintenance of bones and teeth. Proud to be recognized as the Most Trusted Brand* in Canada delivering the best quality milk and cultured products for more than 100 years. We are committed to caring for our communities and providing consumers with delicious dairy made with 100% Canadian milk. *Voted most trusted brand in the Milk category, based on the 2024 BrandSpark Canadian Shopper Study

Plus up your drink with Natrel Plus Vanilla. Made from 100% Canadian milk, Natrel Plus Vanilla contains 18g of protein per 250ml serving, provinding twice as much protein than regular milk. With 50% less sugar than regular 1% chocolate milk, Natrel Plus Vanilla is the perfect addition to your smoothie or coffee for a touch of vanilla.

product_name: Dairyland Lactose Free 2% Partly Skimmed Milk, 4L
short_description: Dairyland products have brought generations of families together around the dinner table. And for those who are lactose intolerant, Dairyland lactose free milk products are easy to digest with all the goodness. And if you don’t want to miss out on the sweet side of milk, our lactose free chocolate milk options ensure everyone has something to love at your kitchen table. Proud to be recognized as the Most Trusted Brand* in Canada delivering the best quality milk and cultured products for more than 100 years. product_name: Natrel Lactose Free Fat Free Skim 0%, 2L
short_description: Through our unique process, we can preserve the deliciously pure taste of fresh milk in every glass of our products, while removing the lactose that can cause you discomfort. So you can once again benefit from an excellent source of calcium, vitamin D and protein, plus a source of vitamin A. That’s everything you need to maintain a well-balanced diet. • White Milk • Fresh Taste • Natural • Natrel’s premium Quality

Enjoy the great taste of chocolate milk, all over again. Our Lactose Free Chocolate is rich and creamy, and will satisfy even the biggest fans of chocolate milk – without the discomfort. • Chocolate Milk • Fresh Taste • Natural • Natrel’s premium Quality

A handful of “indulgence on the go” to satisfy your sweet craving. At Neilson, we've been providing 'always fresh and local' Canadian dairy to families for more than 100 years. We’re proud to be recognized as a Most Trusted Brand* and to be the #1 dairy Masterbrand in Ontario. We continue to offer nutritious dairy products for growing families across the country. *Voted most trusted brand in Ontario in the Milk category, based on the 2024 BrandSpark Canadian Shopper Study. www.BrandSparkMostTrusted.com Neilson’s milkshakes are made with fresh 2% milk and come in five awesome flavours – original Neilson French Vanilla and Strawberry, plus Cadbury Caramilk, Mr. Big and Crispy Crunch.*

For over 100 years, Canadians have made Dairyland milk products part of their family. And while our family has grown, our commitment to delivering fresh goodness has never changed. We proudly support Canadian dairy farmers, which is why you’ll only find Canadian milk inside our cartons, jugs, and packaging.  Dairyland Ultrafiltered Milk delivers a rich, creamy texture with 18 grams of protein from milk in every 250 mL glass. Made with 100% Canadian milk, it’s processed through a fine filtration system that naturally concentrates protein and reduces lactose. The result is a refreshing drink enriched with milk protein concentrate, offering a nourishing and satisfying experience.

product_name: Milk 2 Go Milk Chocolate 1% Bottle 310ML/10.4 oz (12/Case)
short_description:
Indulge in Milk 2 Go Milk Chocolate 1% - 310 mL/10.4 oz Bottle (12/Case)

Treat yourself to the rich and creamy delight of Milk 2 Go Milk Chocolate 1%, a perfect blend of chocolatey goodness and wholesome nutrition. Each case contains 12 convenient 310 mL/10.4 oz bottles, ensuring freshness and satisfaction with every sip.

Key Features:

  • Rich Chocolate Flavor: Experience the decadent taste of chocolate combined with the creamy texture of 1% partly skimmed milk, delivering a satisfying treat for any time of day.
  • Nutrient-Packed: Packed with protein and essential nutrients, Milk 2 Go Milk Chocolate 1% provides a balanced source of nutrition for an active lifestyle.
  • On-the-Go Convenience: Single-serve bottles are ideal for a quick snack or a refreshing addition to your lunchbox, offering convenience without compromising on taste.
  • Quality Assurance: Always fresh and delicious, Milk 2 Go Milk Chocolate 1% ensures a premium taste experience with every bottle.

Whether you're craving a mid-day pick-me-up or a post-workout refresher, Milk 2 Go Milk Chocolate 1% is your go-to choice for a delightful blend of flavor and nutrition. Enjoy the goodness of chocolate and milk wherever life takes you.

product_name: Cloverdale Milk Skim Instant Powder 10 KG/22lbs - Canadian Made
short_description:
Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder – High-Quality Dairy for Versatile Applications

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a premium Canadian-made dairy ingredient, perfect for a wide range of culinary and industrial applications. With excellent solubility, dispersibility, and wettability, this high-protein, low-fat milk powder is ideal for baking, cooking, and beverage formulations.

Why Choose Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder?

Pure, Nutritious, and High-Quality

  • Made from 100% real skim milk, providing essential nutrients and a clean dairy taste.
  • High in protein and calcium, supporting balanced nutrition.

Superior Solubility & Easy Mixing

  • Dissolves instantly in hot or cold water, making it ideal for instant beverages and food applications.
  • Designed for excellent dispersion, ensuring smooth, lump-free results.

Versatile Culinary & Industrial Applications

  • Baking: Enhances texture, flavor, and browning in bread, cakes, and pastries.
  • Beverages: Perfect for hot cocoa, smoothies, coffee creamers, and protein shakes.
  • Soups & Sauces: Adds creaminess and richness to instant soups and dressings.
  • Desserts: Used in puddings, ice creams, and confectionery for a smooth finish.
  • Infant Formula & Nutritional Products: A trusted dairy base in powdered nutritional formulations.

Product Details

  • Size: 10 KG (22 lbs) bulk packaging
  • Made in Canada, ensuring strict quality control and premium standards
  • Shelf-Stable & Long-Lasting, perfect for commercial and home use

Ideal for Food Service & Manufacturing

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a reliable, high-quality ingredient for bakeries, food processors, beverage manufacturers, and home kitchens. Stock up today and experience the convenience of premium powdered dairy!

product_name: Central Dairies Ultra-Filtered Lactose Free 2% Milk, 2% Partly Skimmed, 2L
short_description: Enjoy the same fresh, delicious taste of Central Dairies milk — now lactose free. Our new line is made right here at home, so everyone can enjoy nutritious dairy products that suit their needs. An excellent source of calcium, vitamin D, and protein, plus a source of vitamin A, it’s everything you need to help maintain a well-balanced diet. And with every glass, you’re supporting Newfoundland & Labrador farmers, workers, and families — keeping our dairy industry strong for the future.

Neilson ultrafiltered milk s fresh milk from Canadian dairy farms that passes through a fine filter to concentrate the natural protein and reduce the lactose, a naturally occurring sugar in milk. It does not require refrigeration and stays fresh in your pantry. Just chill prior to serving and after opening. Offering 18 g of protein per 250 mL and 25% less lactose (sugar) than regular milk, Neilson ultrafiltered milk is a simple way to fuel your day with a little extra joy.

Québon partly skimmed reduced sugar chocolate milk with added vitamins A and D is an excellent source of protein. Now with 40% less sugar and 25% less calories than regular chocolate milk. Bringing together the nutrition of milk with a delicious chocolate taste you can enjoy. Perfect for a midday snack or after a workout.  With 14g of sugar per 250ml serving!
